/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by tall buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The buildings are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the towering buildings, emphasizing their height and grandeur.
